attributes.action: Jail for life child rapists and murderers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Once someone has been charged with the rape and/or murder of a child they should never be allowed to walk the streets again EVER. People like that do NOT deserve to see the light of day again. People like that are sick and will always be sick. No normal person would do that to a child and you cannot fix such a troubled mind. Please stop releasing them back into our streets so they can do it again.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
